mapper.select: select * from InquiryChattingRoom where user_id = #{user_id} order by updated_at desc

SELECT r.chatting_room_id AS r_chatting_room_id, r.user_id AS r_user_id, r.admin_id AS r_admin_id, m.chatting_ctt AS m_chatting_ctt, m.created_at AS m_created_at, m.writer_id AS m_writer_id, u.user_nickname AS u_user_nickname, a.admin_nickname AS a_admin_nickname FROM InquiryChattingRoom r LEFT JOIN InquiryChattingMessage m ON r.chatting_room_id = m.chatting_room_id LEFT JOIN User u ON r.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN Admin a ON r.admin_id = a.admin_id WHERE r.user_id = #{user_id} AND (r.chatting_room_id, m.chatting_message_id) IN (SELECT chatting_room_id, MAX(chatting_message_id) max_id FROM InquiryChattingMessage GROUP BY chatting_room_id) ORDER BY m.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: insert into InquiryChattingRoom (chatting_room_id, user_id, admin_id, status_id, created_id, updated_id) values (#{chatting_room_id}, #{user_id}, #{admin_id}, 'I01', #{created_id}, #{updated_id})
mapper.select: select * from InquiryChattingMessage where chatting_room_id = #{chatting_room_id} order by created_at desc limit 1

select m.writer_id m_writer_id, m.chatting_ctt m_chatting_ctt, m.created_at m_created_at, m.created_id m_created_id, u.user_id u_user_id, u.user_nickname u_user_nickname, u.user_name u_user_name, u.user_email u_user_email from InquiryChattingMessage m left join User u on m.writer_id = u.user_id where m.chatting_room_id = #{chatting_room_id} order by m.chatting_message_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into InquiryChattingMessage (chatting_room_id, writer_id, chatting_ctt, created_id) values (#{chatting_room_id}, #{writer_id}, #{chatting_ctt}, #{created_id})
